verses.name: Luke 12:33
verses.text: Sell that ye have, and give alms; provide yourselves bags which wax not old, a treasure in the heavens that faileth not, where no thief approacheth, neither moth corrupteth.

verses.name: Luke 12:34
verses.text: For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.

verses.name: Luke 12:35
verses.text: Let your loins be girded about, and your lights burning;

verses.name: Luke 12:36
verses.text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord, when he will return from the wedding; that when he cometh and knocketh, they may open unto him immediately.
